sections.heading: IMPOSSIBILITY OF PERFORMANCEArt
sections.text: 1873. Obligor not liable when failure caused by fortuitous eventAn obligor is not liable for his failure to perform when it is caused by a fortuitous event that makes performance impossible.An obligor is, however, liable for his failure to perform when he has assumed
